snippet: Commissioner Tim Finchem said the policy of not allowing courses that discriminate in membership to host tournaments will be waived for Augusta National.
abstract: Commissioner Tim Finchem says the PGA Tour will continue to make an exception with Augusta National, which does not permit women as members, despite the Tour's policy of not allowing courses with discriminatory membership practices to host tournaments.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Tim Finchem said the policy of not allowing courses that discriminate in membership to host tournaments will be waived for Augusta National.

headline.seo: PGA Tour Keeps Exception for Masters
headline.main: PGA Tour Keeps Exception for Masters
headline.print_headline: Tour Keeps Exception on Memberships for Masters
